title: Just finished my chat restrictions.
body: Lol jk straight after I got more.

replies.body:
... people complain on the boards about trolls who don't get chat restricted, gj
(slow clap)
And you felt this "surprising" twist was deserving of it's own thread?

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6rTbGEYH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-11T14:51:35.388+0000)
>
> And you felt this "surprising" twist was deserving of it's own thread?

Simple fact back-to-back restrictions should not exist, I did my crime don't punish me with more 'cause your system is shit.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6rTbGEYH,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-04-11T15:38:42.321+0000)
>
> Simple fact back-to-back restrictions should not exist, I did my crime don't punish me with more 'cause your system is shit.

how do you even get chat restricted?
Sorry if I have a hard time believing you didn't do something to warrant the restriction.
Ofc it's deserving... Who doesn't want to know this stuff?

> Who doesn't want to know this stuff?

Me...
Pffttt... Don't lie to yourself, you obviously want to know the little meaningless things other people do :P
you shouldn't have gotten chat restricted in the first place. honestly wouldn't surprise me if you deserved the second set.

Or you could behave in a manner that doesn't get you chat restricted.

I mean you must have put a bit of effort into getting chat restricted, I rage and argue with people in some games but I don't get restricted, you must do it every game. What is wrong with you? Seriously.
